name: Team Giant Crab
description:
Controls:

A and D or Arrow Keys to move left and right, Spacebar to jump. 

(Esc/Exit button does not work, Alt + F4 to close)

Resources:

Tutorial used to make the game: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLrnPJCHvNZuCVTz6lvhR81nnaf1a-b67U (Coding In Flow, 2021)

Asset Packages used to make the game:

  • Background Music  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/casual-game-bgm-5-135943
  • Sound Effects https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5...
  • Level and Sprite Designs https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/pixel-adventure-1-155360
